```{r knitr_setup, include=FALSE, purl=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
set.seed(1)
knitr::opts_knit$set(
  aliases = c(h = 'fig.height', w = 'fig.width'),
  width = 75)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  cache=FALSE, 
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#",
  echo = FALSE,
  fig.align="center",
  message = FALSE,
  tidy = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE)
knitr::knit_hooks$set(small.mar = function(before, options, envir) {
  if (before) par(mar = c(4, 4, .1, .1))
})
devtools::load_all(quiet = TRUE)
```

})
